articles.description: Dikymbe Martin scored 18 points, six of them in the final three minutes, as UC Riverside held off a late rally to beat Cal State Northridge, 69-62 in a Big West contest Wednesday night.
articles.headline: UC Riverside gets 2nd Big West win, top CSU Northridge 69-62

articles.description: Guard Riley LaChance hits a 3-pointer with 0.5 seconds remaining to hand the Commodores the home victory in a back-and-forth game.
articles.headline: Buzzer beater gives Vandy 81-80 win over MSU

images.caption: Guard Riley LaChance hits a 3-pointer with 0.5 seconds remaining to hand the Commodores the home victory in a back-and-forth game.
images.name: Buzzer beater gives Vandy 81-80 win over MSU

articles.description: Clemson coach Brad Brownell said junior Shelton Mitchell was taken to a local hospital for a CT scan and was set to remain there overnight as a precaution.
articles.headline: Clemson's Shelton Mitchell hospitalized overnight as precaution

articles.description: SEC Now's Peter Burns, Jimmy Dykes and Antoine Walker dish out some SEC love to players around the conference.
articles.headline: SEC Valentine's Day superlatives

articles.description: Tevon Saddler and Roddy Peters scored 15 points apiece, and Nicholls held on to beat Sam Houston State 73-72 on Wednesday night for its fourth straight win.
articles.headline: Nicholls holds off Sam Houston State 73-72

articles.description: Aaron Cook sank two free throws with four seconds remaining in overtime, Armon Fletcher scored 22 points and Southern Illinois turned back Missouri State 81-80 Wednesday night, running its record to 7-1 over the last eight games.
articles.headline: Cook late FTs lift S. Illinois over Missouri St. 81-80, OT
